perturbation.original_text: Qualigen hereby appoints Sekisui, and Sekisui accepts the appointment to act on an exclusive basis pursuant to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, as a distributor for the sale of the Products in the Territory. Sekisui shall be permitted to appoint sub-distributors in the Territory (including any current Qualigen distributors) with the approval of Qualigen, not to be unreasonably withheld or delayed.
perturbation.changed_text: Qualigen hereby appoints Sekisui, and Sekisui accepts the appointment to act on an exclusive basis pursuant to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, as a distributor for the sale of the Products in the Territory. Sekisui shall be permitted to appoint sub-agents in the Territory (including any current Qualigen distributors) with the approval of Qualigen, not to be unreasonably withheld or delayed.
perturbation.explanation: The change from 'sub-distributors' to 'sub-agents' creates uncertainty about the nature of the relationship between Sekisui and these entities. Are they acting as independent distributors or as agents of Sekisui? This can affect liability and responsibility.

perturbation.original_text: Sekisui shall in good faith use commercially reasonable efforts, in conformance with good commercial practice and standards, government regulations and other applicable requirements, to promote, market and sell the Products, to execute the Business Plan and to achieve its objectives. Except as set forth in Section 3.2, such forecasts and budgets are intended for guidance purposes only and are not binding obligations.
perturbation.changed_text: Sekisui shall in good faith use commercially reasonable efforts, in conformance with good commercial practice and standards, government regulations and other applicable requirements, to promote, market and sell the Products, to execute the Business Plan and to achieve its targets. Except as set forth in Section 3.2, such forecasts and budgets are intended for guidance purposes only and are not binding obligations.
perturbation.explanation: The substitution of the word 'targets' for 'objectives' creates ambiguity. 'Objectives' often implies broad strategic goals, while 'targets' can suggest specific, measurable metrics. This shift blurs the line between aspirational goals and contractual obligations.

perturbation.original_text: Each Party shall advise the other Party promptly (but in any event within no more than 48 hours) of any warning (including any FDA Form 483), citation, indictment, claim, lawsuit, or proceeding issued or instituted by any federal, state or local governmental entity or agency against the Party, or of any revocation of any license or permit if, and only to the extent that, the manufacture, storage, or handling of the Product, or the marketing, selling, promotion or distribution of the Product, is affected.
perturbation.changed_text: Each Party shall advise the other Party promptly (but in any event within no more than 48 hours) of any warning (including any FDA Form 483), citation, indictment, claim, lawsuit, or proceeding issued or instituted by any federal, state or local governmental entity or bureau against the Party, or of any revocation of any license or permit if, and only to the extent that, the manufacture, storage, or handling of the Product, or the marketing, selling, promotion or distribution of the Product, is affected.
perturbation.explanation: Changing ‘agency’ to ‘bureau’ introduces an inconsistency in the terminology used to describe governmental bodies. This could lead to confusion about which types of entities the notification requirement applies to, particularly if there are specific legal distinctions between agencies and bureaus in the relevant jurisdictions.
